ModMetaData.name: Vault-Tec - Handy things for your vault!
ModMetaData.author: Twink315
ModMetaData.description:
Vault-tec is here for you! All new residents, please proceed in an orderly fashion. Welcome home and thank you for choosing Vault-tec!
This mod adds a bunch of Vault related items, furniture and production features which can be researched once the prerequisites have been mastered.
List of Features:
Furniture: -Beds -Endtable -Commode -Vault Seats -Vault Lamps (Big, Medium, Small) -Vault Lockers (Clothing Storage) -Overseers Office Desk (table) -Vault Sofas (recreation item)
Production: -Vault Production Tables and Linkables (Servers) for advanced production once the research haas been done. -Vault Nutritien Paste Dispenser. Dispenes Nutritient Paste. If used with the mod "Nutrient Paste Tiers" it dispenses a special Vault-Tec nutritient Paste.
Energy:
-General Atomics Reactor. Provides 3000M of energy. Requires Uranium -Vault-Tec Super-reactor. Provides 15000M of energy. Requires Uranium.
Structures: -Diner Floors in various Colours! -Smooth Vault-tiles!
